original_title: 17. Faire du Scuba diving avec Fred sur l'île du Grand Bleu
overview: Sandy and Fred are backpacking through Eastern Europe. If they are here together, it's not just a coincidence. Julie, Fred's sister and Sandy's best friend, killed herself a year ago. This trip starting as a tribute soon becomes an unexpected journey to friendship and understanding.
title: 17. Scuba diving with Fred on the island of "The Big Blue"
